tasks.text:
Here are some life tips and facts:

If you exercise regularly, you feel healthier. When you don't get enough sleep, you feel tired. If you eat too much sugar, it's bad for your teeth. When you study consistently, you learn better. If you smile at people, they usually smile back. When you're kind to others, life is easier. If you press Ctrl+S, it saves your document. If the battery is low, charge your phone. When water reaches 0°C, it freezes. If plants don't get sunlight, they can't grow.

Describe rules in your workplace or school

produce.example:
Here are some things I know about computers and health:

If you spend too much time at a computer, your eyes get tired. When you don't take breaks, your back starts to hurt. If you keep good posture, you feel better at the end of the day. When you exercise regularly, you have more energy for work. If you eat healthy food, your brain works better. When you get enough sleep, you're more productive. If you press Ctrl+Z, the computer undoes your last action. When you restart a computer, it often fixes small problems!
criteria: Uses if/when + present simple + present simple

texts.title: Kitchen Science
texts.content: Cooking is full of science! If you heat oil too much, it starts to smoke. When you add baking soda to vinegar, it bubbles. If you cook eggs slowly, they become creamy. When you knead dough, gluten develops. If you freeze meat, it lasts longer. When you caramelize sugar, it turns brown. If you don't refrigerate milk, it goes bad. Cooking is chemistry!

texts.title: Health Facts
texts.content: Your body is amazing! When you exercise, your heart beats faster. If you drink water, you stay hydrated. When you sleep well, your body repairs itself. If you eat vegetables, you get vitamins. When you stretch, your muscles become flexible. If you breathe deeply, you feel calmer. When you laugh, your body releases happy hormones. If you don't move, your muscles weaken.

texts.title: Computer Tips
texts.content: Here are useful computer tips! If you press Ctrl+C, it copies text. When you press Ctrl+V, it pastes. If you close all programs, your computer runs faster. When you update software, you get new features. If you click the X button, the window closes. When the internet is slow, restart your router. If you use strong passwords, your accounts stay safe.

texts.title: Nature Rules
texts.content: Nature follows rules! When the sun sets, nocturnal animals wake up. If there's no rain, plants wilt. When seasons change, birds migrate. If bees pollinate flowers, fruits grow. When predators hunt, prey animals hide. If the moon is full, tides are stronger. When volcanoes erupt, they release ash. If ecosystems are balanced, all species thrive.

texts.title: Life Wisdom
texts.content: Here's some life wisdom! If you smile, people smile back. When you're honest, people trust you. If you help others, you feel good. When you make mistakes, you learn. If you practice, you improve. When you're patient, good things come. If you believe in yourself, you succeed more often. When you're grateful, you feel happier. Simple truths work!
